services.why_buy: Learn to recognize project patterns and predict outcomes and team member behaviours more accurately. detail_desc.title: About the Training
detail_desc.content_html:
This hands-on training teaches you to work effectively with AI tools through practical prompt engineering techniques. Learn what AI and large language models actually are, how they process information, and the real opportunities and risks they present for your work.

Master proven prompting techniques including zero-shot prompts, role-based prompts, analogical reasoning, hierarchical structuring, and chained prompts for complex tasks. Practice with multiple AI platforms including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and specialized tools for creative and analytical work.

Apply AI across diverse domains including data analysis with Excel integration, visual art generation, and music composition. By the end, you'll have practical skills to leverage AI effectively in both professional and creative contexts.

detail_desc.title: About the Training
detail_desc.content_html:
This training examines notorious real-world software failures and security breaches to build practical security awareness. Through compelling case studies, participants see how small oversights like configuration mistakes, unsafe update mechanisms, and weak authentication escalate into outages, data breaches, and financial losses affecting millions.

Learn to recognize security risks earlier and communicate them effectively across teams. The training emphasizes building security-conscious cultures where protective thinking becomes part of everyday design and decision-making, not just compliance checkboxes.

Designed for both technical and non-technical audiences, this session combines storytelling with practical lessons. Participants gain insights from post-incident analysis, understanding both how failures occur and how organizations successfully recover and prevent future incidents.

questions.question: What materials are given to training participants?
questions.answer: Participants in the training will receive a free Notorious Programming Related Faults Study Guide.

questions.question: What is the duration of the training?

questions.question: Are there any prerequisites for attending the training?
questions.answer: No specific prerequisites are required. The training is suitable for all levels.

services.why_buy: Security breaches cost millions and destroy reputations overnight. Learn from others' expensive mistakes instead of making your own. Recognize vulnerabilities before they become incidents and build the security mindset that makes you invaluable to any organization.

services.name: Social Engineering Defense for High-Value Technical Professionals
services.keywords: social engineering defense, personal security awareness, targeted manipulation tactics, professional sabotage prevention, high-value targets protection, work-life security balance
services.html_desc: Learn to recognize and defend against social engineering attacks targeting technical professionals. Understand manipulation tactics designed to reduce productivity and compromise critical projects through personal life exploitation.
services.short_desc: Protect yourself from targeted social engineering and manipulation tactics. Learn to recognize when personal relationships, social situations, and daily interactions are being exploited to sabotage your work performance and compromise critical projects.

detail_desc.title: About the Training
detail_desc.content_html:
This training equips high-value technical professionals with the awareness and skills to recognize social engineering attacks that extend beyond the workplace into personal life. Learn how adversaries exploit relationships, social situations, and daily interactions to manipulate productivity, steal information, or sabotage critical projects.

Participants explore real-world scenarios where engineers and technical professionals became targets through seemingly innocent social connections, family pressures, romantic relationships, and community interactions. Understand the psychology behind targeted manipulation and develop practical strategies to maintain security awareness without becoming paranoid or isolated.

The training combines lessons from both team dynamics and security incident analysis, showing how personal vulnerabilities connect to professional risks. Learn to recognize warning signs, establish healthy boundaries, and protect yourself while maintaining genuine relationships and work-life balance.

questions.question: Who is this course ideal for?
questions.answer: This training is ideal for software engineers, technical leads, security professionals, and anyone working on critical or sensitive projects who may become targets of social engineering through their personal lives.

questions.question: What is the duration of the training?
questions.answer: The training typically lasts for 4 hours, but it can be adjusted based on your needs.

questions.question: Are there any prerequisites for attending the training?
questions.answer: No specific prerequisites are required. The training is suitable for all levels.

services.why_buy: Your technical expertise makes you a valuable target. Adversaries know they cannot always breach systems directly, so they target you through personal relationships and social manipulation. Learn to recognize these tactics before they compromise your work, damage your reputation, or sabotage projects worth millions. Protect yourself without sacrificing genuine relationships or becoming isolated.

services.name: English Vocabulary for Software Projects Training for Turkish Speakers
services.keywords: software english vocabulary, programming vocabulary, technical english communication, international team collaboration, english for developers
services.html_desc: Learn essential English vocabulary for software projects with interactive lessons, real examples, and a study guide covering 2,222 words.
services.short_desc: Communicate confidently in global software teams by mastering essential English terms. Our training combines practical examples with guided practice, making it simple to expand your vocabulary and use it effectively in real projects.

detail_desc.title: About the Training
detail_desc.content_html:
This training is designed to help software professionals expand their English vocabulary and communicate more effectively in international projects. Instead of focusing on technical details, the course uses examples from the software world to explain English words in context, making it easier to understand both their meanings and how they are used in real-life projects.

Through interactive online sessions, you will learn the meanings and correct pronunciations of new words, practice using them in sentences, and reinforce your knowledge with review exercises. By the end of four lessons, you will have learned 100 commonly used words with your instructor, and with the help of the Software English Study Guide and Review Practice Notebook, you will continue building your vocabulary up to 2,222 words.

questions.question: What materials are given to training participants?
questions.answer: Participants will receive the Software English Study Guide and Review Practice Notebook, which include Turkish translations of 2,222 words along with sample English sentences from the software field.

questions.question: How do you teach words?
questions.answer: During the course, the instructor explains English words using example sentences taken from the software world. While teaching the Turkish meaning of each word, the instructor also provides examples of how the word is used in software projects. This approach makes it easier to understand both the term itself and the context in which it is commonly used.

questions.question: Are there opportunities for practice in the training?
questions.answer: Yes, there are sections during the training where participants will practice speaking.

questions.question: Is there any homework?
questions.answer:
Yes. Our training begins with interactive sessions where you learn the meanings and correct pronunciations of new words.

Your homework between lessons is to complete the exercises in the review practice notebook. By the end of four lessons, you will have learned 100 words together with your teacher.

After this stage, you will continue building your vocabulary independently. Using the study guide and the review practice notebook, you will reach a total of 2,222 words.

questions.question: Which programming languages does this course focus on?
questions.answer:
This training does not focus on technical aspects of programming. Instead, its purpose is to expand your vocabulary so you can better understand your teammates and actively participate in business communication.

For example, consider the sentence: “In case you are adamant on using multiple inheritance, it should be done in C++.”

In our course, the word “adamant” is introduced to teach its meaning—insistent, stubborn, determined. At the same time, you may also learn that “multiple inheritance” is a concept that can be applied in C++.

However, the course does not go into technical details about how this works. The focus remains on language and communication.

questions.question: Who is this course ideal for?
questions.answer: This training is ideal for software developers working with international teams on global projects, IT professionals seeking to communicate more effectively in cross-cultural meetings, individuals evaluating remote job opportunities, and contributors to open source projects who want to collaborate seamlessly across language and cultural barriers.

questions.question: What is the duration of the training?
questions.answer: The training is 16 hours in total, but it can be adjusted based on your needs.

questions.question: Are there any prerequisites for attending the training?
questions.answer: No specific prerequisites are required. The training is suitable for all levels.

services.why_buy: Global software opportunities require strong English communication. Gain the competitive edge to excel in international projects and advance your career faster. Stop feeling hesitant in meetings with global teams and become the confident communicator every international team wants.

services.name: Test Driven Development Workshop Training
services.keywords: TDD training, unit testing workshop, automated testing workshop, software training, developer workshop
services.html_desc: Professional hands-on workshop on Test Driven Development methodologies using VS Code, covering unit tests, integration tests, and acceptance tests for C# and JavaScript.
services.short_desc: A practical TDD workshop that teaches the test-first cycle through theory, live demonstrations, and hands-on practice with xUnit, MochaJS, and Puppeteer for comprehensive test coverage in programming.

detail_desc.title: About the Workshop Training
detail_desc.content_html:
Workshop Overview

This hands-on workshop introduces Test Driven Development in a clear and practical way. Developers work step by step through the TDD process, with examples in languages such as C# and JavaScript. The emphasis is on how TDD shapes code design, testing strategy, and everyday development practices.

Participants also explore the testing pyramid, learning how unit, integration, and end-to-end tests complement one another. Through guided practice, they build the skill to choose the right level of test for a given problem and balance effort across different types of testing.

By the end, developers will be able to apply TDD in their daily work, write meaningful tests that guide design decisions, and maintain confidence in their codebase as it grows. Juniors and intermediates will strengthen their foundations, while seniors will find opportunities to refine their approach and mentor others.

Learning Methodology

The workshop follows a learn–demo–practice cycle. First, participants are introduced to the principles of TDD and the Red-Green-Refactor cycle. The instructor then demonstrates how to apply these principles in practice, before guiding participants through exercises where they write tests and build features themselves, often working in pairs or small groups to share insights.

Examples use familiar tools such as Visual Studio Code, xUnit, MochaJS, and Puppeteer, but these are shown only to illustrate techniques. Participants are encouraged to adapt TDD practices to the tools and languages they already use in their own work.

questions.question: Who is this course ideal for?
questions.answer: This workshop is designed for software developers, engineers, and tech leads who want to improve code quality, reduce bugs, and adopt Test Driven Development practices.

questions.question: What are the technical prerequisites?
questions.answer: Participants should have VS Code installed and basic programming experience in C# or JavaScript. Familiarity with basic testing concepts is helpful but not required.

questions.question: Do I need prior testing experience?
questions.answer: No prior testing experience is required. The workshop starts with fundamentals and progressively builds to advanced TDD techniques with plenty of practical exercises.

questions.question: What is the workshop structure?
questions.answer: The full-day workshop follows three phases: theoretical TDD foundations, live instructor demonstrations with xUnit/MochaJS/Puppeteer, and hands-on participant practice with guided coding tasks in VS Code.

services.why_buy: This workshop gives developers practical experience with Test Driven Development, focusing on the habits and mindset that improve code quality over time. Participants learn through a cycle of explanation, live coding, and guided practice so they not only understand TDD concepts but also apply them with confidence in real projects.

detail_desc.title: About Consultancy
detail_desc.content_html:
The rapid growth of open source AI models offers organizations powerful opportunities for innovation, but choosing, integrating, and optimizing these models requires careful expertise to avoid costly mistakes and security risks.

Our consultancy helps businesses unlock the full potential of open source AI through strategic integration that aligns with business goals while upholding the highest standards of security, compliance, and performance.

We provide end-to-end guidance on model evaluation, selection, and architectural design, ensuring that each AI implementation delivers measurable value. Our process includes a thorough assessment of your infrastructure, data pipelines, and technical capabilities, enabling seamless integration into existing systems.

Whether you're evaluating Llama for language tasks, considering DeepSeek for reasoning applications, exploring Qwen for multilingual capabilities, implementing Gemma for efficient deployment, assessing Granite for enterprise use cases, or integrating GPT-OSS variants, we provide the strategic guidance and technical expertise needed to transform open source AI from experimental technology into production-ready business solutions.

services.why_buy: The open source AI landscape evolves rapidly. Choosing the wrong models or integration strategies can lead to wasted development time, data security risks, and long-term technical debt. Every day spent hesitating gives your competitors a chance to move ahead while you face the complexity of model selection, licensing issues, and integration challenges. Our expertise simplifies this complexity. We provide clear, actionable strategies that deliver real business value. Instead of relying on untested models or trial-and-error integrations that may fail in production, you benefit from proven methodologies and reliable approaches. We eliminate the guesswork and technical barriers that prevent most organizations from successfully deploying open source AI. This gives you the confidence to innovate quickly while maintaining the security and reliability your business requires.
services.info: As a first step, we offer a free online preliminary assessment meeting. Depending on the scope of your project, our consulting services are approximately $35 per hour.

services.name: Vendor Dependency Evaluations
services.keywords: vendor risk assessment, supply chain security, third-party evaluation, dependency analysis, competitive threat assessment
services.html_desc: Comprehensive vendor ecosystem analysis and risk assessment across all business operations, using software expertise to identify hidden integration points, dependencies, and vulnerabilities that could impact operational resilience.
services.short_desc: We specialize in identifying and mitigating hidden risks in your software supply chain through comprehensive vendor evaluation and dependency assessment. Our consultancy helps organizations build resilient strategies against third-party vulnerabilities, competitive threats, and supply chain disruptions, ensuring business continuity and security through strategic diversification and contingency planning.

detail_desc.title: About Consultancy
detail_desc.content_html:
Even the most reliable vendors can create hidden dependencies that threaten the resilience of your supply chain and expose your organization to unforeseen risks. Our consultancy specializes in uncovering and mitigating these vulnerabilities through comprehensive assessments of vendor relationships, integrations, and dependencies across both software and non-software domains.

We analyze critical points of failure, security gaps, and competitive pressures that could disrupt operations or compromise intellectual property. Our approach extends beyond software ecosystems to include third-party services, contractual obligations, and process dependencies, ensuring that risks are identified wherever vendor reliance exists.

By evaluating potential sabotage scenarios, competitive threats, and systemic weaknesses, we help organizations design robust strategies that strengthen resilience and protect business continuity. Our solutions include strategic diversification, contingency planning, and resilience engineering practices tailored to your industry and market position.

With expertise in software risk as well as broader vendor ecosystems, we deliver competitive intelligence, threat modeling, and actionable strategies that safeguard your operations. The result is a stronger, more adaptable organization that can innovate with confidence, free from the vulnerabilities of hidden vendor dependencies.

services.why_buy: Hidden vendor dependencies and supply chain vulnerabilities are ticking time bombs that can instantly cripple your business operations, expose sensitive data, or hand competitive advantages to your rivals. Every day your supply chain operates without proper risk assessment, you're gambling with your company's future, trusting that vendors won't fail, get compromised, or turn against your interests. Our specialized evaluation process reveals the invisible threats lurking in your vendor relationships and dependency chains before they become expensive disasters. Rather than discovering critical vulnerabilities during a crisis when it's too late to respond effectively, you gain the foresight and prepared strategies needed to maintain operations regardless of external disruptions. We transform your supply chain from a potential liability into a competitive advantage, giving you the confidence to innovate boldly while your competitors remain vulnerable to the same hidden risks you've already mitigated.
services.info: As a first step, we offer a free online preliminary assessment meeting. Depending on the scope of your project, our consulting services are approximately $35 per hour.
